description.oldValue: This feature will provide users to ability to beautify & straighten ink handwriting in Whiteboard to improve legibility.
description.newValue: This feature will provide users to ability to beautify and straighten ink handwriting in Whiteboard to improve legibility. Note: We will not be rolling out this release at this time. When ready, we will advise via Message Center. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
